channel.title: Ancient Magics Altar
channel.description: Where would i go to spawn a ancient magics altar on my server cause right now its not there.

item.title: Ancient Magics Altar
item.dc:creator: @ReZ-Gaming ReZ-Gaming
item.description:
@ReZ-Gaming wrote:

Lmfao Yeah actually I bet I can code way better then your ass now. I’d love to play your pathetic leeched server and tbh It was leeched and I coded about everything on there except the basic shit that came with it. I downloaded a blank 317 PI and coded all that shit myself. I bet you can’t say the same. You kids on here leech shit and look for tutorials on how to do shit instead of learning. I’m not sure why you have 200 rep cause your terrible at coding tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient Magics Altar
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

ReZ-Gaming:

Lol i join this community seeing if someone could help me with my ancient magics and the first post that someone puts says “There i spoonfed you”. I guess this isn’t anywhere near the community i thought it was. Whatever im not going to argue with some 10 year old kids that leech servers all the time and don’t know how to code anything. Cya later MoparGay I wont be returning.

And you know how to code? You couldn’t even figure out how to add an object, aswell
you’re going to go cry because someone said “there i spoonfed you” after they posted two whole tutorials helping you on your small, meaningless leeched project insanity that will only end up going into your garbage bin after you download the latest version of hybrid pvp with the newest 600+ graphics.
sorry man, you must take alot of anti depressants to get you through the day huh.

Read full topic

@hunterowner3 wrote:

[quote=“ReZ-Gaming, post:5, topic:419315”]Thanks and its pretty funny how you guys say:

There, you’ve been spoonfed.

I crack up at that everytime!
This is a community for private servers and if i remember correctly this is the “Server Help” section so if you don’t want to help people and you say you are “spoon feeding” everyone then don’t post in the help section. That simple.
KTHXBAI![/quote]

Actually, this section is for experts to teach new coders. They don’t like to spoon-feed because you don’t learn anything from that.

item.title: Ancient Magics Altar
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

317 Delta - Client.java

To add an object, add this line of code underneath the one above

xxxx = x coordinates
yyyy = y coordinates
6552 = ancient altar id

There, you’ve been spoonfed.
